name: Pigment (whataboutme42)
description:
submitted for the Brackeys jam

  • WASD, arrow keys to move
  • space, W, up arrow to jump
  • click to shoot(shoots at mouse)

Can't see anything captain. Use your paint gun to reveal walls and obstacles.  Not ideal but I'd take what I can get.

Some art and sound by Amburjer(Instagram, YouTube, twitter)
